channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dogs taken into pitch, 13th January
item.description:
I've reported to Abbey oyeleye Housing officer for glebe estate about the dogs getting taken into the football pitch by Maria who is a neighbour on the estate. The dogs make a mess and shouldn't be taken in there as there are signs saying no dogs allowed. I sent numerous emails to Abbey but nothing has been done.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vestry Mews, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 black sacks of refuse, 13th January
item.description:
2 black sacks of refuse have been dumped in Cavendish Avenue, Sidcup DA15. towards the Burnt Oak Lan end. You sent me an email to say that this matter has been resolved & the case closed but the 2 sacks as in my earlier photo are still there at 8.15 pm & are being ripped open by foxes.

item.title: Drain is blocked on 284 Kingsland Rd, 13th January
item.description:
Drain at 284 Kingsland Rd (east side, just next to the bus shelter) is blocked, which is causing flooding of the sidewalk and flooding in the bus lane. This was previously reported in FixMyStreet ref: 8520621 and was closed as "Fixed," but the problem has not been fixed, and it's unclear whether any action was taken. Please ensure the problem is fixed before closing again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 315, Kingsland Road, Haggerston, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
